comment.author: 41141009@N07
comment._content:
The Munttoren is situated on the largest bridge of Amsterdam. At the other side the water is called Binnen Amstel. Over here the water is part of the canal structure and is it called Singel. On the right nowadays you'll find the famous flowermarket.
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4119254183/]

comment.author: 34419668@N08
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/tram_5] Great that you informed us about the correct name of the area. Thank you! Singel seen on Google Maps: g.co/maps/fc6j9 I Also very interesting to know about the Munttoren (Mint Tower) to the right in the picture. I found some more information on Widipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Munttoren /Anna B.
